sentences.en: After renovation, production capacity of cuprammonia scrubber is raised above 20 %.
sentences.cn: 改造后, 铜洗塔的生产能力提高20%以上.

sentences.en: Alternatively, a chemical may be injected into the scrubber water, which then reacts with the pollutants.
sentences.cn: 另外, 化学物质会被注射入擦洗器的水中, 然后与污染物起反应.

sentences.en: Flue gas with high SO 2 concentrations or temperatures reduce the performance of the scrubber.
sentences.cn: 含有较高二氧化硫含量或者温度的废气将降低洗气器的性能.

sentences.en: From aproned pot - scrubber to the flanneled potentate, everybody liked me, everybody petted me.
sentences.cn: 不论是围着围裙的陶艺大师还是穿着法兰绒大衣的政治家, 每个人都喜欢我, 都爱逗我玩.

sentences.en: From the aproned pot scrubber to the flanneled potentate, everybody liked me, everybody petted me.
sentences.cn: 从系围裙的擦锅工到穿法兰绒的权贵, 人人喜欢我, 人人宠我.

sentences.en: PPL Montana has Fibrecrete installed in various Scrubber Modules , Turbine Decks and Water Boxes.
sentences.cn: 蒙大拿电力采用萨伟真纤维涂层,用在脱硫洗涤塔, 汽机平台,和水箱内.

sentences.en: Pressure drop is the basic data for design and operation of a gas - liquid impinging stream scrubber.
sentences.cn: 压降是气液撞击流洗涤器设计和操作的基础数据,目前研究多为实验数据的经验关联,理论依据不足.

sentences.en: Reverse flow of scrubber solution into cylinder must be prevented.
sentences.cn: 必须防止擦洗器溶液回流入钢瓶.

sentences.en: Scrubbing effect of a nozzle scrubber and factors affecting it are discussed in this paper.
sentences.cn: 讨论喷嘴洗涤器除尘作用和影响除尘效果的各种因素.

sentences.en: Some suction is provided by the ejector scrubber and the tail gas fan.
sentences.cn: 喷射洗涤器和尾气排风机可提供部分吸力.

sentences.en: Tap the album to display the shuffle, repeat, and scrubber controls.
sentences.cn: 点击专辑,可以显示随机播放 、 重复和清除的选项.

sentences.en: The gas is first humidified in a scrubber.
sentences.cn: 气体先在洗涤器内湿润.

sentences.en: The Venturi railing scrubber wet equipment with compound mechanisms for coal - fired flue gas scrubbing.
sentences.cn: 文氏栅洗涤器为复合净化机理烟气除尘脱硫一体化洗涤设备.

sentences.en: These results will help to optimize the design and operation of the spray drying scrubber.
sentences.cn: 本文结果将有助于改进喷雾脱硫塔的设计和操作.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the basic structure of the tray, calculation of pressure drop, arrangement in scrubber.
sentences.cn: 本文主要介绍了该塔板的基本结构 、 压降估算 、 塔内排列新方案以及应用实例.

words.tran_cn: 矮小的；临时凑合的；次等的
矮树；洗擦；擦洗者；矮小的人（或物）
擦洗；废止；揉搓（scrub的过去分词）
[化工][矿业]洗涤器；洗刷者；刷子

phrases.tran_cn: 湿式除尘器；湿式洗涤器

trans.tran_en: a person or thing that scrubs
